plot: A mad doctor performs a head transplant on an injured criminal, which results in him being even more dangerous and murderous than before.
title: Las ratas no duermen de noche
plot_es: A mad doctor performs a head transplant on an injured criminal, which results in him being even more dangerous and murderous than before.
original_name: Las ratas no duermen de noche
plot_en: A mad doctor performs a head transplant on an injured criminal, which results in him being even more dangerous and murderous than before.
